definition: characterized by violence or bloodshed, red color or pigment
details:
adjective
- characterized by violence or bloodshed
= synonyms: crimson
- of a color at the end of the color spectrum (next to orange)
= synonyms: crimson
- suffused with blood from emotion or exertion, reddened
= example: suffused with blood from emotion or exertion, reddened
= synonyms: crimson
noun
- red color or pigment
= synonyms: redness
- emotionally charged terms used to refer to extreme radicals or revolutionaries
= synonyms: Marxist
- the amount by which the cost of a business exceeds its revenue
= synonyms: loss
